```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
setwd("~/Code/NCBA/resources")
source("ncba_functions.R")
library(auk)
```

Pull in records for carrying a fecal sac "FS"
```{r}
fs <- get_breeding_records(behaviors = c("FS")) %>%
  to_EBD_format() %>%
  auk_unique()
```

Print the records
```{r}
print(fs)
```

```{r}
print(unique(fs$common_name))
```

Map
```{r}
fs_sf <- records_as_sf(fs, kind = "observations", method = "points")

# Make a simple map
ggplot(data = counties_NC()) +
    geom_sf() +
    geom_sf(data = fs_sf, size = 4, shape = 20, 
            colour = "darkred", fill = NA) + 
    ggtitle("Records of Birds Carrying Fecal Sacs", subtitle = "")
```

When were the codes reported?
```{r}
box <- breeding_boxplot(species = NULL, data = fs, type = "ecoregional")
show(box)
```
